original_title: นักโทษสาว ผีเฮี้ยน
overview: 10 years ago Soy escaped from prison but was apprehended by a guard, raped, and killed. But her soul is not at peace and she continues to haunt the prison, which today has been renovated into a resort. One day the son of her murderer comes to the resort and she gets the opportunity to avenge her death.
title: Nakthotsao Phi Hian
